# King Saud Domestic Airport

King Saud Domestic Airport (|OEBA|p=n}}) is an airport located in Al-Aqiq, serving Al-Baha Province in Saudi Arabia.
Facilities
The airport resides at an elevation of  above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 07/25 with an asphalt surface measuring .
Airlines and destinations
Riyadh
| Saudia | Dammam, Jeddah, Riyadh
}}
